Name: Socialite
Ingredients: 20 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rich citrus with lashings of vanilla.
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered in 2001 at Lab Bar in Soho, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Socialite contains 140 calories
